shortdesc.ph: Used to configure the low-quality video stream.
Used to configure the video low stream in different quality layers.

section.p: Used to set encoding parameters including resolution, bitrate, and frame rate.

plentry.pd: Video dimensions. Default is 50% of the high-quality stream. See .
Video bitrate (Kbps). Default is -1. You do not need to set this parameter; the SDK automatically matches the optimal bitrate based on the video resolution and frame rate you set.
Local video frame rate (fps). Default is 5.
Video resolution. The default value is 50% of the resolution of the high-quality video stream. See VideoDimensions.

Video bitrate (Kbps). The default value is -1. You do not need to set this parameter manually. The SDK automatically matches the most appropriate bitrate based on the video resolution and frame rate you set.
